meanings.sent1: The mysterious lights in the sky remained unexplained.
meanings.sent2: The detective was puzzled by the unexplained disappearance of the key witness.
meanings.sent3: The unexplained noise in the old house turned out to be a playful kitten.
meanings.sent4: Her sudden change in behavior was as unexplained as a magic trick.
meanings.sent5: The unexplained phenomenon left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The unexplained instructions on the test confused the students.
meanings.sent2: The unexplained symbols on the map led the explorers astray.
meanings.sent3: The unexplained math problem seemed like a riddle without an answer.
meanings.sent4: His unexplained absence from the meeting raised suspicions among his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The unexplained behavior of the robot left the engineers scratching their heads.
